name: Anton Dvorson
role: Software Architect | Generative AI Engineer | Full-Stack Developer
summary: Strategic and results-oriented software architect and full-stack engineer with 12+ years of experience delivering scalable, high-traffic solutions. Deep expertise in Node.js, React, TypeScript, GraphQL, AWS, and DevOps, with a proven track record in e-commerce platforms, embedded systems, editorial tools, and payments infrastructure. At the forefront of the AI-driven paradigm shift, adept at leveraging generative AI and LLM technologies to accelerate development and innovation. Proven ability to align technical strategy with business goals, driving performance improvements and delivering measurable ROI.

skillCategories.Languages & Frameworks: JavaScript/TypeScript, Node.js, React, Next.js, Express, GraphQL, RESTful APIs, Kotlin, Python
skillCategories.Cloud & DevOps: AWS (EC2, Lambda, S3, RDS), Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, CI/CD (Jenkins, GitHub Actions), Azure, GCP
skillCategories.AI & LLM: Langflow, Neo4j, GraphRAG, RAG, Vector DB (Milvus), LLM Agents, OpenWebUI, Custom Ontology Design
skillCategories.Data & Databases: MongoDB, DynamoDB, PostgreSQL, MySQL, Elasticsearch, Redis, Caching strategies
skillCategories.Practices & Tools: Microservices, Event-driven & Serverless architectures, Agile/Scrum, DevSecOps, n8n, Git/GitHub, Jira

experience.title: Lead Software Engineer

highlights: Tech lead for GenAI Enablement at Fortune-500 retailer — building the foundational LLM serving and agentic platform enabling company-wide AI agent development
Introduced structured SDLC practices to a team of 4 engineers — establishing planning disciplines and delivery visibility frameworks for management
Contributing to secure multi-tenant AI platform with isolated, governed agent deployments enforcing data access controls across retail and supply chain domains

Introduced structured SDLC practices — planning disciplines, delivery visibility frameworks
Contributing to secure multi-tenant AI platform for enterprise-scale internal adoption
